name: jsm-defaults
description: Shopify version - Shopify CLI for themes

scripts.postinstall: node scripts/skip.js ||  cp -r node_modules/shopify_jsm-image-tiles/scss . && cp -r node_modules/shopify_jsm-image-tiles/sections . && cp -r node_modules/shopify_jsm-image-tiles/snippets . && cp -r node_modules/shopify_jsm-image-tiles/locals . && cp -r node_modules/shopify_jsm-image-tiles/assets . && echo "Post install Ran"

author: James Mcavady
